$description: Motiv app color tokens. Warm, calm, emotionally mature palette. Trust, steadiness, and follow-through — not competition. Skews warmer and calmer for a predominantly female (≈70%), 35–55 audience.

primary.description: Primary Clay (Warm Rose-Clay). Primary brand color, key highlights, emphasis moments. Warm, human, emotionally resonant — signals care, commitment, and humanity.

secondary.description: Confidence Accent (Muted Plum). Creator emphasis, moments of authority, select CTAs. Mature, confident, emotionally rich — adds depth without skewing playful or aggressive.

primary.description: Primary Ink (Deep Slate). Primary text, headers, grounding contrast. Softer than black, modern, confident, emotionally neutral.

secondary.description: Sage Neutral. Supporting text, secondary UI. Calm, grounded, restorative.

tertiary.description: Light sage. Placeholders, disabled text, very subtle labels.

inverse.description: Inverse text color. Use on dark or colored backgrounds.

link.description: Link text color. Uses Confidence Accent for interactive inline text.

primary.description: Primary background. Main app and screen background.

secondary.description: Soft Blush (Light Clay). Backgrounds, cards, section fills. Creates warmth and approachability — makes concepts feel safe and non-threatening.

tertiary.description: Warm Sand. Subtle structure, inactive areas. Organic and natural — avoids cold greys while providing hierarchy.

elevated.description: Elevated surface. Floating cards and overlays (use with shadow).

default.description: Warm Sand. Default border color — organic and natural hierarchy.

strong.description: Warm Sand darker. Emphasized boundaries, focused inputs.

focus.description: Primary Clay focus ring. Accessibility focus indicator.

gradients.$description: Dynamic gradient backgrounds for onboarding and decorative screens. These move as organic blobs.

pink.description: Warm pink gradient. Welcoming, nurturing energy.

mint.description: Fresh mint gradient. Growth, health, vitality.

sunshine.description: Warm sunshine gradient. Optimism, energy, joy.

sky.description: Light sky gradient. Freshness, openness, possibility.

success.description: Success state. Completed actions, achievements, positive feedback.

warning.description: Warning state. Attention needed, pending items.

error.description: Boundary / Error. Disqualified holds, warnings, constraints. Firm but not alarming — communicates boundaries without shame or punishment.

celebration.$description: Dark surfaces for special moments (wins, losses, challenge results).

background.description: Dark celebration background. Rich, immersive for special moments.

hover.description: Hover state overlay for interactive surfaces.

categoryBadges.$description: Color-coded category badges for product recommendations and content types.
